description.en: A powerful physical attacker that interacts directly with hardware. High risk, high return.
description.jp: ハードウェアを直接操作する物理アタッカー。高リスク・高リターンな性能。

special_move.effect: Rewrites the system coordinates of enemies, forcing them out of bounds.

description.en: The foundation of all languages. Extremely difficult to control but possesses absolute power.
description.jp: 全ての言語の根源。制御は極めて困難だが、絶対的な破壊力を持つ。

name.jp: レジスタ直接アクセス

special_move.effect: Instantly teleports to the enemy's CPU address and delivers a fatal blow.

description.en: Balanced with both physical power and complex class-based logic.
description.jp: 物理的な破壊力と、クラスに基づいた複雑な論理攻撃を兼ね備える。

special_move.effect: Combines traits of multiple classes into one massive physical strike.

description.en: Features an iron-clad defense by the 'Borrow Checker'. Almost no bugs.
description.jp: 「所有権」による鉄壁の防御を誇る。バグモードに対して非常に強い。

special_move.effect: Traps enemies in a static memory area, preventing any movement.

description.en: Weak physical stats, but can unleash powerful logic spells instantly.
description.jp: 身体能力は低いが、強力なライブラリ魔法を即座に呼び出せる。

name.jp: ディープラーニング・ノヴァ

special_move.effect: Deploys an AI that predicts and counters every enemy move.

description.en: Uses asynchronous attacks and event loops to confuse opponents.
description.jp: 非同期攻撃とイベントループで相手を翻弄するトリッキーな言語。

special_move.effect: Forces the enemy into an infinite loop of delayed actions.

description.en: The standard of enterprise. High HP and stable performance across all fields.
description.jp: エンタープライズの標準。高い耐久力と安定した性能を持つ万能型。

name.jp: ガベージコレクション・ブラスト

special_move.effect: Purges all objects on screen, clearing enemy projectiles and damaging them.

description.en: Specializes in high concurrency. Can attack with multiple 'Goroutines' simultaneously.
description.jp: 並行処理に特化。複数の「Goroutine（分身）」で同時攻撃を仕掛ける。

name.jp: 超並行・多重プッシュ

special_move.effect: Creates dozens of clones to push all enemies into the GitHub sea at once.

description.en: A functional language that fights with pure logic. Hard to understand but flawless.
description.jp: 純粋関数型の論理を武器に戦う。理解は難しいが、完璧な立ち回りが可能。

special_move.effect: Alters the world's state, making the enemy's existence 'Nothing'.

description.en: Highly optimized for mobile combat. Fast, sleek, and safe.
description.jp: モバイル戦闘に最適化された言語。高速で洗練されたコンボが得意。

name.jp: オプショナル・アンラップ

special_move.effect: Forcibly reveals the enemy's hidden weak points and strikes them.

description.en: An expressive language that prioritizes programmer happiness. Can alter rules beautifully.
description.jp: プログラマの幸福を追求する表現豊かな言語。美しくルールを書き換える。

name.jp: メタプログラミング・マジック

special_move.effect: Dynamically changes its own attack type to the enemy's weakest resistance.

description.en: Modern and expressive with strict null safety. Highly compatible with Java.
description.jp: 厳格なNull安全を持つモダンな言語。Javaとの高い互換性と洗練された能力を持つ。

special_move.effect: Becomes immune to all 'Null' based attacks and gains temporary invincibility.

description.en: Adds static typing to JavaScript. Predicts and blocks runtime errors.
description.jp: JSに静的型付けを追加。実行時エラーを予見して未然に防ぐ防御的トリックスター。

special_move.effect: Forces the enemy into a specific 'Interface', restricting their available moves.

description.en: Versatile and powerful. Uses LINQ to process multiple enemies at once.
description.jp: 多機能で強力。LINQを駆使して複数の敵を同時に処理するパワー型。

special_move.effect: Queries all enemies in range and delivers a simultaneous calculated strike.

description.en: Extremely lightweight and fast. Specializes in rapid movement and embedding.
description.jp: 極めて軽量で高速。素早い動きと、他の環境への潜り込み（組み込み）が得意。

name.jp: テーブル・インジェクション

special_move.effect: Injects random tables into the stage, creating unexpected obstacles or buffs.

description.en: Optimized for smooth UI and fast development with 'Hot Reload'.
description.jp: スムーズな操作感に最適化された言語。ホットリロードで即座に状況を立て直す。

special_move.effect: Instantly resets all skill cooldowns and restores a portion of health.

description.en: A ninja-like companion that automates movement and chains attacks.
description.jp: 攻撃を自動で繋げたり、隠れた敵を見つける忍者的なスカウトユニット。

ability.passive: Pipe Chain: Reduces the delay between consecutive skill uses.
ability.active: Grep Scan: Reveals invisible items or traps in the stage.

description.en: A powerful companion that manipulates objects and enforces strict rules.
description.jp: オブジェクトを自在に操り、強力な権限で戦場を支配する支援ユニット。

ability.passive: Object Pipeline: Increases the damage of logic attacks by 15%.
ability.active: Execution Policy: Creates a temporary 'Forbidden' zone where enemies cannot jump.

description.en: Simple but reliable companion from the old days. Specializes in basic automation.
description.jp: 古き良き時代のシンプルな相棒。基本的な連続動作（バッチ）の支援が得意。

ability.passive: Batch Execute: Grants a 10% speed boost after a successful push.
ability.active: Directory Map: Resets the character's position to the last safe ground.

description.en: Summons and manipulates stage elements. Can find anything in the database.
description.jp: ステージ内のオブジェクトを検索・操作する。地形そのものを操る魔術師。

ability.passive: Indexing: Increases the range of target-seeking attacks.
ability.active: DROP TABLE: Temporarily removes a section of the floor beneath the enemy.

description.en: Focuses on structure and defense. Builds the layout of the battle.
description.jp: 構造と防御に特化。戦場に壁や足場を構築し、有利なレイアウトを作る。

ability.passive: Responsive Design: Automatically adjusts defense power based on the opponent's type.
ability.active: Div Barrier: Places a solid wall that blocks physical projectiles for 3 seconds.

description.en: Provides visual support and easier control through a friendly interface.
description.jp: 視覚的なサポートを提供し、難しい操作をマウスカーソルのように補助する。

ability.passive: Auto-Focus: Provides magnetic tracking for attacks (easier to hit).
ability.active: Window Mode: Becomes semi-transparent, dodging one incoming attack automatically.
